notes.text:
This update for file fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-18218: Fixed heap-based buffer overflow in cdf_read_property_info in cdf.c (bsc#1154661).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: cdf_read_property_info in cdf.c in file through 5.37 does not restrict the number of CDF_VECTOR elements, which allows a heap-based buffer overflow (4-byte out-of-bounds write).
notes.title: Vulnerability description
